overview: “Mr. Couse joined Diversinet in December of 2004 and is responsible for the global market success of Diversinet’s MobiSecure product and service solutions. His responsibilities include corporate, channel, and OEM development. Mr. Couse has over 20 years of experience in technology products and services sales management with multi-national software and wireless technology companies. Previously, Mr. Couse was Vice President of Business Development for Bitfone, where he was responsible for the SmartCare product line, before that he was VP Business Development for Mobile Diagnostix Inc, which was acquired by Bitfone. Mr. Couse holds an Honours BA in Business Administration, Richard Ivey School of Business, University of Western Ontario.” (Source: Diversinet)
